solution_line_template: Annie traveled {blocks_to_bus_stop} + {blocks_bus_to_coffee_shop} = <<{blocks_to_bus_stop}+{blocks_bus_to_coffee_shop}={blocks_to_coffee_shop}>>{blocks_to_coffee_shop} blocks to the coffee shop.
Her round trip would take {blocks_to_coffee_shop} x {multiplier_round_trip} = <<{blocks_to_coffee_shop}*{multiplier_round_trip}={total_blocks_round_trip}>>{total_blocks_round_trip} blocks.
